relation: The file "META.yml" is missing from this distribution. META.yml is needed by people maintaining module collections (like CPAN), for people writing installation tools, or just people who want to know some stuff about a distribution before downloading it. Add a META.yml to the distribution. Your buildtool should be able to autogenerate it.
Does not have license information in any of its source files Add =head1 LICENSE and the text of the license to the main module in your code.

The documentation for this distribution contains syntactic errors in its POD. Note that this metric tests all .pl, .pm and .pod files, even if they are in t/. See 'pod_message' in the dist error view for more info. Remove the POD errors. You can check for POD errors automatically by including Test::Pod to your test suite.
This distribution uses a module or a dist that's not listed as a prerequisite. List all used modules in META.yml requires
This distribution has .pm files with inconsistent versions. Split the distribution, or fix the version numbers to make them consistent (use the highest version number to avoid version downgrade).
None of the package versions in this distribution matches the distribution version. Fix the version(s).
textBeforeTable: These fails do affect your Kwalitee scores. This distribution may not be installed cleanly, or may have some issues in license or documentation. Please consider fixing them, or tell us if they are false. Core metrics Kwalitee Fails CPAN Testers rt.cpan.org search.cpan.org metacpan.org External Resources 82.86 Core Kwalitee 100.00 Kwalitee 2002-03-19 Release Date 1.01 (released by XAOINC on 2002-01-03) 1.02 (released by XAOINC on 2002-01-04) 1.03 (released by XAOINC on 2002-03-19) 1.04 (released by XAOINC on 2002-11-09) 1.05 (released by XAOINC on 2003-11-13) 1.06 (released by AMALTSEV on 2005-01-13) 1.06a (released by AMALTSEV on 2005-01-13) 1.06b (released by AMALTSEV on 2005-01-13) 1.03 Version XAOINC Author/Maintainer Releases Metadata Errors Provides Used By Prerequisites Overview XAO-Base XAO-Base-1.03 Home Search Authors Search Distributions Recent Uploads Stats Ranking Kwalitee CPANTS Toggle navigation
textAfterTable: Extra metrics These fails affect your total Kwalitee score, but don't affect the one for the Game. Some of them should be fixed by all means. Others are just matters of taste. metric remedy has tests in t dir This distribution contains either a file called 'test.pl' (the old test file) or is missing a directory called 't'. This indicates that it uses the old test mechanism or it has no test-suite. Add tests or move tests.pl to the t/ directory! no stdin for prompting This distribution is using direct call from STDIN instead of prompt(). Make sure STDIN is not used in Makefile.PL or Build.PL. See http://www.perlfoundation.org/perl5/index.cgi?cpan_packaging Use the prompt() method from ExtUtils::MakeMaker/Module::Build. proper libs There is more than one .pm file in the base dir, or the .pm files are not in lib/ directory. Move your *.pm files in a directory named 'lib'. The directory structure should look like 'lib/Your/Module.pm' for a module named 'Your::Module'. If you need to provide additional files, e.g. for testing, that should not be considered for Kwalitee, then you should look at the 'provides' map in META.yml to limit the files scanned; or use the 'no_index' map to exclude parts of the distribution. meta yml has license This distribution does not have a license defined in META.yml. Define the license if you are using in Build.PL. If
